titleNullable: Education Attainment in Colorado School Districts
subtitleNullable: Education attainment and school enrollment for 20 school districts in Colorado
descriptionNullable: While working on a consulting project for an education-related non-profit organization, I attempted to make Year to Year (YoY) predictions and visualizations about the school enrollment and educational attainment of their targeted students in the specified area. I encountered several problems when scraping the related datasets from the [United States Census Bureau](https://data.census.gov/). Therefore, I cleaned and re-categorized the datasets to publish here in case someone wants to add more analysis on the Colorado early education issues as well as learn by themselves.
